name: Holey Wars
description:
- Local Multiplayer Only -

PvP turn based game. Take control of the magnificent warriors who won't avoid any sugar rush.

The browser version is a bit buggy, download the .exe for a whole experience

Best of 3 matches wins.

Created and developed in 2 days with a 3 person team for MiniJam 56.

Equally proud and ashamed

Features:

- Local multiplayer

- Turn based combat

- Different abilities

- Doughnuts
